ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree bards should be in on this item, but seeing as enchanters rely more heavily on charisma (crowd control), they should get priority over bards.  Did
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Apr 2000 John_Senior@... wrote:
>
> there was only myself and an enchanter there that would use it to it's full
> potential. But instead it was decided that the enchanter should get to keep
> the item and that I shouldn't get to roll for it.
>
> I was really angry to be treated like this especially as we have just got a
> new charm song, the tranix crown would of been great.

I agree bards should be in on this item, but seeing as
enchanters rely more heavily on charisma (crowd control), they
should get priority over bards. Did they just say that you
couldn't have the item, or did they say that normally you
could but they felt it be best for the enchanter to get this
one?

> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 44.8 Songs <Guardians of Light>

Out of curiosity, what level was the enchanter? A lot of
factors usually go into these decisions, including level,
skill, niceness, amount of time spent with the guild/alliance,
etc.

--
